values: 砍；剁碎；截断；取消；中止；摆脱；反复无常；（风向）突变；（价格、数量）大幅度削减；使上下（或来回）剧烈移动；（飞机或船）颠簸
劈；砍；（食物的）切块；切片；肉排；排骨；（在某些体育运动中的）削球动作；（音乐中的）切分音

pos_mean_info_list.mean: [电子] 斩波器；斧头；切碎机

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指粗暴地乱剪、乱砍、乱劈。
普通用词，使用广泛。指用带刃工具的切、割、砍等的行动。
指用刀斧连续猛力砍某物，以便砍断、切碎。

word_group.brief_definition: 砍掉；剁下；制止某人发言
不算好的, 不太有用的
解雇；取消；废除；杀人；被杀
学究般令人厌烦地争辩；诡辩
变化无常, 反复变换

bilingual.source: During the camping trip, they used a machete to chop firewood.
bilingual.target: 在露营时，他们用大砍刀劈柴。

bilingual.source: He chop ped at me with his knife, but missed.
bilingual.target: 他用刀向我砍来，但未砍中。

bilingual.source: Why do you chop at the tree ?

bilingual.target: 枪打领头鸟,斧砍长头草.

bilingual.source: I want to chop down these trees.

bilingual.target: 俺们不会把人的脑袋砍下来。

bilingual.source: Slow down…he will be awoken by a slight chop.
bilingual.target: 不用着急，我轻轻的砍他一下他就会醒了。

bilingual.source: You're not going to chop up my advertising budget, again?
bilingual.target: 你不会又要砍我的广告预算吧?。

list.abstract: chop（英 [tʃɒp]，美 [tʃɑːp]），英语单词，作动词为砍；劈；剁。作名词为切击；劈；肉排。例句：All these projects are destined for the chop.（所有这些工程注定要被取消。） chop的近义词有brand，hew，logo等。

yingyinNormal.en: If you leave now, I will chop off my hand and give it to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要你愿意离开，我就把手砍下来送你！

yingyinNormal.en: Now, can we chop the tree down? No. We'll have to call the highest rescue service in the land.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在我们可以把树砍到了吗？不行，看来我们只有找本地最高级的救援服务了。

yingyinNormal.en: How do you get Tortoises out of trees? Chop the tree down. Yes, let's chop the tree down. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯，要怎么把乌龟从树上弄下来呢？我们把树给砍倒就行了！没错，我们就来把树砍倒吧！不行！

yingyinNormal.en: How are we going to rescue Tiddles? Chop the tree down. No. I'll ring the fire brigade.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要怎么把小土豆救下来呢？我们把树砍倒吧。不行，我来打电话给消防局吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that didn't work, did it? What are we going to do now? Chop the tree down. No. I'll call the next rescue service.
yingyinNormal.zh: 啊，消防队也没有办法了。那么我们现在该怎么办呢？我们把树给砍倒啊！不行！我给另一个救援中心打电话吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Chop-chop, Leonard. We leave in ten minutes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，麻利点，我们十分钟后出发。

yingyinNormal.en: We need that paper clip. Chop-chop, soldier.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们需要那个回形针！赶快，战士们！

yingyinNormal.en: Now roughly chop some spring onion, coriander and, finally, chives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 随手切几段葱、香菜，还有韭黄。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I'm at work, ordinary day, you know, chop chop chop, saute, saute, saute.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在上班，跟平常的一天一样，切切切，煎煎煎。

yingyinNormal.en: This is not happening. Be that as it may, page nine says that you have to provide me with lemon-flavored sparkling waters, so chop-chop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不是真的。即便是这样，第九页写着你得为我提供柠檬味的气泡水，所以赶紧的…

yingyinNormal.en: Let me ask you guys something. If, someday, Lily wanted to be Lou and had the whole chop-chop, bing-bang thing, how would you be with that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我问你们一个问题。如果某一天，莉莉想当卢[男生名]，然后去做了全套“切切拼拼”的手术。你们会作何反应？

yingyinNormal.en: Now just before serving, we just want to chop up some coriander.
yingyinNormal.zh: 装盘之前，我们来切一些香菜。

yingyinNormal.en: Special enzymes arrive at the scene and chop the virus to pieces.
yingyinNormal.zh: 特殊的酶赶到现场，把病毒切成数块。

yingyinNormal.en: While that's cooking, I'm going to very quickly chop up some vegetables.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在煮面过程中，我会快速地切碎一些蔬菜。

yingyinNormal.en: You heard the woman! Peel. Chop. Devil. I can't believe I lost 2 minutes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们听到了，削皮，剁，切，真不敢相信我停了两分钟。

yingyinNormal.en: For dinner, something simple, a veal chop, some scampi, whatever you like.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正餐的话，可以随便吃点，一份小牛排，几个虾，随便什么都行。

yingyinNormal.en: You didn't kill her and chop her up, that's not what we're smelling, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你没有杀死她，然后碎尸吧，屋里的味道不是尸臭，对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Add the tomato-ey sauce prepared earlier. Roughly chop some greens, spring onions and coriander.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加入先前准备好的蕃茄酱汁，粗粗切一些葱和香菜。

yingyinNormal.en: You spend more time on your back than a hooker in heat. Now pick up that fucking ax and go chop us...
yingyinNormal.zh: 你躺着的时间，比发骚的妓女都要久，快拾起斧头去劈点...

yingyinNormal.en: And then I need a hot wok. Crack the crab claws but leave the meat in the claws. Roughly chop a chilli.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后我要把锅烧热。敲碎蟹爪，但把肉留在爪子里。粗粗地切碎一只辣椒。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 削减; 终止; 取消

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 砍掉；剁下；制止某人发言

examination_example.sentence: After that，I <highlight>chopped</highlight> the wood away from one side, and then from the other side.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 之后，我将木头从一侧切开，然后从另一侧切开。

examination_example.sentence: I found a big tree and <highlight>chopped</highlight> it down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我找到了一棵大树，然后把它砍倒了。
